mapper.delete: delete from po_headers where po_header_id in (${ids})
update po_headers set status=#{status} where po_header_id in (${ids})
mapper.select: SELECT ph.*, fu.USER_NAME as agent_name, fu2.USER_NAME as create_name, fu3.USER_NAME as update_name , mc.customer_name as vendor_name FROM po_headers ph LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu on ph.agent_id = fu._id -- 采购人 LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu2 on ph.create_by = fu2._id -- 创建人 LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu3 on ph.update_by = fu3._id -- 更新人 LEFT JOIN mdm_customers mc on ph.vendor_id = mc.customer_id -- 供应商 where po_header_id=#{po_header_id}
